title: Refer a Friend boarder?
body: Is there any way we could get a boarder showing that we got the twitch/ww skin through refer a friend instead of through the honor system?

replies.body: I believe they already have vintage borders for earning them way back in the day.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if that's something we can do for you, if it's not already present.
There were boarders for earning them before refer-a-friend changed to the new 2.0 system, however there is no boarder for the change from refer-a-friend to the honor system.
